name: Bichrome
description:
It's a game where a ball is bouncing on a platform

And the both the ball and platform changes in colour, two to be exact red&blue (hence Bichrome)

You tap on the screen to switch the colour of the bouncing ball

When the colours of both the ball and the platform match then the platform would even change to the next colour or remain there is a 50% chance

Once the colours match upon collision of the ball and platform you get a point

If the ball and the platform mismatch in colours then you lose the game and your ball explodes
